// src/services/apiService.js
import axios from'axios';const BASE_URL='https://localhost:7066/api';export const getGenres=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Genres"));return response.data;};export const getAuthors=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Authors"));return response.data;};export const getMangas=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Mangas"));return response.data;};export const getReviews=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/Reviews"));return response.data;};
